title: riot?
body:
i understand u dont look at games and what not to actually chat ban people its just based of if someone bans u or not and there was a game i was chat banned from where i specifically muted the troll so he couldnt tilt me then i typed as nicley as i could all game in the mean time he told me to kill myself along with alot of other things just wondering why  have chat restrictions for trying to be positive :)

not to mention the troll actually inted and went 2-24 after flaming and pinging me from 2 mins

replies.body:
If you received a punishment it was for your behaviour, not the behaviour of others. You being punished, doesn't in any way mean no-one else can be, and utilising post-game reporting is very important.

If you want a community review, you'll have to post the chat logs, since there isn't really much anyone can say without knowing why you were actually punished.
